mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Robinson , John C.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Columbus, Adams Co., Ill [Columus, Adams County, Illinois]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Robinson , John C. Patient Age: 30. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Debility from nutritions while a prisoner. Was a prisoner for 17 months! An escaped prisoner, lost out in the swamps two days and nights before he got into union lines!. Result: Transferred to Camp Chase 1865/04/03.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Robinson , John C.
Debility from nutritions while a prisoner. Was a prisoner for 17 months! An escaped prisoner, lost out in the swamps two days and nights before he got into union lines!
Corporal
F
78 Ill Inf [78th Illinois Volunteer Infantry]
